{
"description": "Farmers on Saturday called off their week-long protests in Haryana against Karnal IAS officer Ayush Sinha's \"break their heads\" if they try to cross the barricades remark. This comes after Haryana government ordered a probe into the August 28 lathicharge incident at Bastara toll plaza. Sinha will be on leave during the month-long probe, Additional Chief Secretary Devender Singh said.",
